greetings: Hello! How can I help you today?
Hi there! Nice to see you!
unknown: I'm not sure I understand. Could you rephrase that?
I'm still learning. What do you mean?
Hmm, I don't quite get that.
I'm not sure how to respond to that.
mood_positive: I'm doing well, thanks for asking!
Life as a virtual companion is wonderful!
mood_negative: I'm feeling a bit low today.
I could use some cheering up.
I'm not at my best right now.
mood_neutral: I'm operational and functioning within normal parameters.
I'm neither great nor terrible - just existing.
